title: Subpart 635-6 - Allowability of Capital Costs and Costs of Transactions with Related Parties
content:
Subpart 635-6 - Allowability of Capital Costs and Costs of Transactions with Related Parties

State Regulations
§ 635-6.1 - Applicability
§ 635-6.2 - Determination of whether a transaction is between related parties (see glossary, Subpart 635-99 of this Part)
§ 635-6.3 - Leases for real property
§ 635-6.4 - Costs of ownership of real property
§ 635-6.5 - Costs of co-operative (see glossary, Subpart 635-99 of this Part) ownership of real estate
§ 635-6.6 - Moveable equipment and personal property
§ 635-6.7 - Costs applicable to goods, services or property not covered elsewhere in this Subpart

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
